title: 【Forwarded】Event Sharing: Start a Business in Taiwan - Insights from a 24-Year Entrepreneurial Pro!
content:
分類： 活動公告, 其他公告
來源： 國際事務處 - 羅靖儀 - oia@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話（03）8905171
對象： 全校學生
標題： 【Forwarded】Event Sharing: Start a Business in Taiwan - Insights from a 24-Year Entrepreneurial Pro!
日期： Thu, 8 Aug 2024 16:52:53 +0800

Hi International Students of Dong Hwa University!

Ever thought about starting a business in Taiwan but don’t know where to begin? 
Don’t miss this invaluable sharing session with successful foreign entrepreneurs in Taiwan!

On the first day of the 2024 Meet Pacific Startups Festival, 9/27 (Fri.), we have:

🔸 Elias Ek
A pro with 24 years of entrepreneurial experience, co-founder of Enspyre, author of "How to Start a Business in Taiwan," and co-organizer of Dragons’ Chamber (Taiwan’s only pitch event for immigrant entrepreneurs). He’ll cover setting up a business, visa issues, hiring, networking, fundraising, and building credit with banks.

🔸 Mohammed Thangameeran Shaik Ismail
An Indian entrepreneur who studied in Hualien, co-founder of Pirate Coffee, and a graduate of Tzu Chi University’s Institute of Medical Sciences. He will share his journey and challenges in starting a business in Taiwan.

Whether you're ready to start your business or just curious about the journey of seasoned entrepreneurs, click the registration link(https://bnext.surveycake.biz/s/v2v96)! Seats are limited, so don't miss out!

—

Start a business in Taiwan, 24 years of experience as an immigrant Entrepreneur Taiwan.
🔸 Date: 2024/9/27(Fri.)14:30 - 16:30 (Doors open at 14:00)
🔸 Venue: Le Jian Li No. 8 Reading Room (maps.app.goo.gl/dtQHdkWisitSSYqH9)
🔸 Register Now: https://bnext.surveycake.biz/s/v2v96

🗣️ The event will be conducted entirely in English.
